body.name: KZZI Z98 Mechanical Keyboard, Hot Swap Gasket Wireless Gaming Keyboard with Knob OLED Smart Display, Wireless/Bluetooth/USB-C Wired for Win/Mac (Tactile Switch, Purple)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 13 hrs 24 mins
features: 【Hot Swap Gasket Mount Keyboard】KZZI Z98 utilizes a high-quality gasket material to eliminate any noise. The hot swappable mechanical keyboard supports 3-pin and 5-pin mechanical switches. Equipped with sandwich foam, socket foam, and PBT keycaps with SA profile, the solid keyboard provides pleasant typing feeling, ideal for professionals who demand custom keyboard fun, superb quality, and top comfort.

【Wireless/Wired,Extra Hub Ports 】 This gaming keyboard comes with 1 USB port and 2 Type-C Ports, convenient to connect with a variety of different peripherals. With built-in 3750mAh battery, this wireless mechanical keyboard supports BT, 2.4GHz and wired connection. With Windows software, you can even customize unlimited RGB, macro keys and remap keys. 2.4G wireless dongle and wired type c cable are included.

【Multi-function OLED Smart Display】 KZZI Z98 keyboard has OLED screen and metal knob, making this wireless mechanical keyboard fun! Smart Display functions: custom GIF, connection modes, battery level, WIN/MAC, RGB setting. You can customize your own screen. The ergonomic keyboard can respond to the simultaneous press of multiple keys, helpful for using hotkeys and real-time games.

【Vibrant RGB Effetcs & South-facing LED】For the backlight, with 14 default light patterns and 8 backlight colors, the RGB keyboard takes south-facing LED, which better illuminate the keyboard backlight and light up gaming accessories. You can easily change RGB with simple shortcuts and the keyboard OLED. The compatible software is available for more DIY settings.

【Wide Compatibility, Mac & Win Double Layout】The Z98 94 key keyboard is for Win/Mac. The multi device keyboard is compatible with Laptop, iPad, IOS, Windows, Mac or Android and so on. The Z98 has dual layout for Windows and MacOS. This PC Gaming Keyboard has been ergonomically designed to be a superb typing tool for office typing or gaming, geared for mechanical keyboard enthusiasts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the sound of the keys,quality RGB is amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: For what you pay, you get a lot of features. I have not had any issues on a wireless connection, and the battery capacity isn't terrible. The screen may seem gimmicky, but it does has useful features, such as letting you know when the caps lock and num lock are on/off. It is a little hard to navigate the menus for the screen at first, but after a slight learning curve it's easy to use.The keycaps are very high quality for being stock, and the profile is great. They hug your fingers, but the curvature is not too aggressive. I ordered the model with the tactile switches, and they offer a good amount of resistance. They feel better than the Kailh browns I had on my previous keyboard, and the sound is very pleasing. It's a deeper clack, as opposed to a high pitched clicky sound. I can't make out any pinging/ringing. The stabilizers are pre-lubed and the hot swap process is easy, if you ever want to change the switches out.if I had to nitpick anything, it's that the software used to customize the keyboard is a little hard to use. I would prefer some sort of VIA implementation. I also wish that it would interface with OpenRGB so I can coordinate the colors with my mouse and the ARGB fans on my PC. These are minor issues, though. Overall, I would definitely recommend anyone interested in a preassembled mechanical keyboard to try it out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars THE QUESTION NO ONE COULD ANSWER.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. How do you set the time?? Well, its easy actually. Download the driver, plug it in via USBC, it will update automatically. LoL also you can download your own little GIF! I recommend keeping it under 25 frames tho.I can't put a link here but if you Google "customize display screen Kzzi keyboard Z98 Driver" and click the site that has " en. Kzzi. Com > news" bottom of the page there is a download for driver. I show it in my video.Absolutely love this keyboard. It's got quite the range. I typically enjoy a tacky-er keyboard but the deep tak on this satisfies, and the keys feel so smooth. Perfect for smaller hands. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this. So much easier for me to type with. However, NO ONE can figure out how to set the time and change it from military time. Even looked on Google and YouTube. No Instructions came with. On Google the manuel offered is to something else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A pleasure to type on but not 5 stars for two reasons: first, I have to use two keys to page up or page down. Second, changing the time display is impossible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: i really like this keyboard, i mainly got it cuz of the mini OLED and it is soo cool and aesthetic even when it comes to typing. the switches on here are really good, it gives 80s newspaper reporter. but you don’t have to keep factory switch as the keep works with any 5 pin switch. 10/10 would recommend if you want an aesthetic, cute keyboard.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It feels a little cheaply made but overall great feature packed keyboard, messing with the gif display is really fun. I put some of my own custom keycaps on it that match the colour,My friend states he hates the keyboard so I put him on it. LOL

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my grandson and he absolutely loved it. It has good keys and even a feature to change the screen to the time or gift and the best part about it is that if I lose the wireless plug it would not matter cause it came with a cord and it is buletooth I would highly recommend this keyborad for gaming.
